data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nascimento, Elynton Alves Do, Bocakova, Milada (2012): Nomenclatural changes and redescriptions in Plateros Bourgeois, 1879 (Coleoptera: Lycidae) from Neotropical region. Zootaxa 3487: 77-84, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212348
